original_title: Your trusted guide to mental health & wellness
processed_title: Your trusted guide to mental health & wellness
content: Start improving your mental health and well-being today. HelpGuide.org shows you how. Find trustworthy information about mental health and wellness that you can use to make better decisions. Build skills to manage your emotions, strengthen your relationships, and cope with difficult situations. Learn how to improve your mental health and well-being—and help your friends and family do the same. As a free online resource, we’re here for you, day or night, whenever you need guidance, encouragement, or support. Explore exclusive content from Harvard Health Publishing, the consumer health publishing division of Harvard Medical School. Pick a topic below that you’d like to explore: HelpGuide’s reviews of the best services A guide to symptoms, treatment, and recovery for BPD How to feel better without hurting yourself Tips to regain your sense of control, rebuild your self-worth, and heal Recognizing the signs and symptoms, and what you can do about it Symptoms, treatment, and tips for overcoming panic Symptoms, treatment, and self-help tips for social phobia Find healthier ways to change how you feel Proven ways to help your loved one accept the treatment they need Recognizing the signs and symptoms of a drinking problem How to reduce, prevent, and relieve stress Techniques for dealing with overwhelming stress HelpGuide.org is dedicated to Morgan Leslie Segal, whose tragic suicide might have been prevented if she had access to better information and guidance. Millions of readers rely on HelpGuide.org for free, evidence-based resources to understand and navigate mental health challenges. Please donate today to help us save, support, and change lives. Get mental health tips and insights delivered to your inbox every other week. Cultivate your ability to be mindful and tuned in to what you’re feeling. Feeling anxious about the future? This mindfulness meditation can help. Change your perspective and fight negativity by practicing gratitude. Harness the power of your breath to ground yourself and regain inner calm. “I don't know how to explain the change this site has made in my life literally overnight. I forgot what makes me happy. I forgot who I once was. Your site has guided me to hope and a plan.” “I was scared to talk to anyone because they would judge me, but every question I wanted to ask was answered on your website. My mind’s clear now and I’ve realized it’s not just my health I’m jeopardizing, but also the people I love. I’m a better man thanks to you.” “This website is an incredible source of knowledge and comfort for me. I'm going through one of the hardest times of my life mentally, and you have made me feel less alone.” “Just wanted to express my appreciation for developing this great resource. It has been very beneficial to me as I battle alcoholism and depression and gave me a lot of good coping techniques to win my battles and control my urges.” “I have been having moderate depressive and anxiety episodes and have used the many wonderful, insightful, and well-researched guides on this site to get through this tough time. . . Truly, I think HelpGuide has saved my life and I cannot thank you all enough.” Assistant Professor of Psychiatry, Harvard Medical School & former Editor in Chief, Harvard Health Psychologist and assistant professor in Psychiatry at the David Geffen School of Medicine at UCLA Professor of Social Welfare and Public Policy, UCLA Luskin School of Public Affairs Clinical-Director of Ryzio Institute and founding president of Santa Barbara Graduate Institute Psychiatrist specializing in women's wellness, University of California, San Francisco Executive Director for Aging and Community Services, Los Angeles County WDACS
summary: HelpGuide.org adalah sumber informasi terpercaya tentang kesehatan mental dan kebahagiaan yang dapat membantu Anda membuat keputusan yang lebih baik. Situs ini menyediakan konten berbasis bukti dari Harvard Medical School, yang membahas gejala, perawatan, dan pemulihan berbagai masalah mental seperti gangguan kecemasan, kecanduan alkohol, dan gangguan kecemasan sosial. Anda dapat mempelajari cara mengelola emosi, memperkuat hubungan, dan menghadapi situasi sulit secara lebih sehat. Sumber ini juga membahas cara membantu keluarga dan teman untuk memperbaiki kesehatan mental mereka. Dalam konteks psikologi Islam, kesehatan mental terkait dengan tazkiyatun nufus—perbaikan diri melalui keimanan, kesabaran, dan kedisiplinan. Praktik seperti meditasi kesadaran, rasa syukur, dan perubahan perspektif dapat membantu mengurangi kecemasan dan membangun kekuatan batin. Situs ini memperingati kehilangan Morgan Leslie Segal, yang mungkin dapat dihindari jika ia memiliki akses ke informasi dan dukungan yang lebih baik. Dengan memperkuat kesadaran diri dan membangun kepercayaan diri, seseorang dapat menghadapi tekanan, mengembalikan rasa kendali, dan memulihkan harga diri. Setiap orang perlu mendekati kesehatan mental sebagai bagian dari perjalanan spiritual dan fisik. Dengan dukungan, informasi, dan praktik yang teruji, kita dapat membangun kehidupan yang lebih sehat, bermakna, dan berkesinambungan. Donasi dapat membantu memperluas akses terhadap sumber informasi ini bagi masyarakat luas.
